rules_text:
Your opponents skip their upkeep steps.
At the beginning of your first upkeep step, you get an additional upkeep step after this step.
notes:
GOLDRARE
Emile Denis — hermes
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/W218qG
WORDY
Whenever you cast a spell, you gain 2 life if it’s an artifact, that permanent enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter or loyalty counter on it if it’s a creature or planeswalker, draw a card if it’s an enchantment, and create a 1/1 colorless artifact Sculpture creature token if it’s an instant or sorcery.
